topic.title: Any help? Zeronet + VPS
topic.body:
Hey Guys,
Who is better at this topic can help me out? My question is, I want to support Zeronet main site and my site to seed them from a VPS, but not sure how to open up the Zeronet on linux (CentOS) where I have only a console and no UI..? Is that possible? And if yes how? Because to seed a website I have to open it in my browser right? But how can I open it if I have only a console available? Might be a stupid question, I'm just a beginner with linux console(s). 
Thank you!

1620169498_14EvrR9QiEpqhQyZDFiftdgAXzNQ1.body: BTW, do we need the freshest users.json file or is also fine if I made a backup last week or month, but after I was using ZeroNet it will be still ok? Or I will lose those/some new things/information in that case..?

> [styromaniac](#comment_3080_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd): The latest copy of your users.json contains your thread subscriptions. [...]

Thanks. Only the thread subscriptions or something else too..?

1621394876_15TSdTU5ZrAHXXiMQvMUEEUm17GFt.body: I'm on Win but I'm fine, at the moment as well it showing 11 tracker. Sometimes it goes down to 0-1-2 but usually just a short time. Average for me I think is around 7-8.

> [seidoken](#comment_16_1Pxg9q2iUdQkbwgT459ArjQ12mpXN8cyEB): http://127.0.0.1:43110/15CEFKBRHFfAP9rmL6hhLmHoXrrgmw4B5o/

Wao, that's nice. But the other ZeroNet users have to use these tracker too no, to send them data? Otherwise it will be just better for that few X amount of ppl who using these trackers, am I right?

1621513388_17acbn9sNyYyLJrLfSz3KJxqonKZt.body: :D You are totally blind man, I don't even know how u was able to come on ZeroNet.. Take the vaccine and be a slave then soon you will feel it what is all about.. ;)

1627296188_17NZ2BiZ1HUYppUcUmU5bgyGkp8kH.body: And how we'll be able to patch it? Or the official project will be updated or..?
As I know nofish will work on the project again, Summer or after summer.

1634240089_1PxcegJ1mKoMHeS73f9MvXeUWDq8B.body:
> [darkasnight](#comment_13_13JuGiUNQFGijiA5NWsKsgv8YWBus5NvV1): where he said that?

Exactly, any proof??

1636910648_1N5YTyNeraRGksf76WNQiJ3ZB2ZMM.body: :D Make sense. I'll try it later on and I'll let you know. Thanks :)

oh, do I have to open UDP / TCP 43110 port?
And should I follow this instruction? Start with ./ZeroNet.sh --ui_ip '*' --ui_restrict your.ip.address to allow remote connections on the web interface.

> [ssdifnskdjfnsdjk](#comment_1145_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnXadUtS): per my experience no, VPS has all ports open you are not behind restrictive home routeriptables -Susually have policy ACCEPT so by default all connections allowed [...]

Thanks. Regarding the port I was asking because I have a firewall running (CWPControlPanel Installed too) so I'm quite sure not all of them are open that's why if is necessary I might have to open it.
Something is wrong.. but I'm not sure what... >> https://prnt.sc/1zl9r5q
Could be related to this issue? https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroNet/issues/1396 Any idea how to fix?

I tired what I could, wait.. restart many times, playing around, TOR on / off etc. and it opens but like dead.. https://ibb.co/kK2npft

Regarding some errors:
[2021-11-15 10:37:49,321] DEBUG ConnServer Conn#160 167.179.77.133 [?] > Connecting... (site: None)
[2021-11-15 10:37:50,322] DEBUG ConnServer Site announce tracker done in 5.004s, sleeping for 128.330s...
[2021-11-15 10:37:50,325] DEBUG ConnServer Conn#160 167.179.77.133 [?] > Closing connection: 167.179.77.133 Connect error: ConnectionRefusedError: [Errno 111] Connection refused in ConnectionServer.py line 208 > Connection.py line 149 > _socket3.py line 335, waiting_requests: 0, sites: 0, buff: 0...
[2021-11-15 10:37:50,325] WARNING Site:1NhLpy..sArA Tracker zero://167.179.77.133:23333 announce failed: AnnounceError: Invalid response: None in SiteAnnouncer.py line 198 > AnnounceZero/AnnounceZeroPlugin.py line 102 in mode update
[2021-11-15 10:37:50,325] DEBUG Site:1NhLpy..sArA Tracker failed, skipping to next one...
[2021-11-15 10:38:51,277] DEBUG Db:ContentDb Optional size: 0.0MB/27275.8MB, Need delete: -27275.8MB
[2021-11-15 10:39:28,549] DEBUG ConnServer Conn#159 94.44.235.178 [v2] > Socket error: ConnectionResetError: [Errno 104] Connection reset by peer in Connection.py line 222 > _ssl3.py line 491 > _ssl3.py line 328
[2021-11-15 10:39:28,550] DEBUG ConnServer Conn#159 94.44.235.178 [v2] > Closing connection: MessageLoop ended (closed: False), waiting_requests: 0, sites: 1, buff: 0...

Can't find trackers properly so can't download..
I even tried to add syncronite but I think couldn't download too..
TOR is not working at all.
Saw this parameter --tor_use_bridges but even if I start with this nothing happens :/

And just now, was able to download syncronite and I got like 6 tracker and was able to download my site content but.. working very badly I think because of bad peers. Maybe the provider could block these somehow..? Then that's why TOR and peers not working as it should? (On my own PC with syncronite it running quite good, around 25 connections always) If that's the case not sure if there is any way to go around / or fix it...

> [ssdifnskdjfnsdjk](#comment_1147_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnXadUtS): @haxorzHopefully you are running latest version or zeronet-enhanced.Your Tor was disabled on that image, for more peers is better to make sure it shows: available or enabled.TOR is not working at all?  -> you need to focus on the error message it is giving to you in the debug.log or maybe even on ZeroHelllo button on the top and search that error on ZeroHello search field (if you have downloaded zerotalk site).  [...]

Sorry for the late answer, I just realised I didn't answer..
Yes, of course I'm running the official latest version of ZN.
TOR was disabled because if I select Always, my NZ not working still, so either I select Enabled or Disabled but not Always. Not sure what the issue is, always just the same errors which I pasted before... nothing really special I think or maybe I'm missing out on something idk. And as far as I know TOR should be properly implemented in the latest version. Or do I have to install anything manually?
"In order to load Syncronite trackers, you have to visit that zite and load it." - Yes, of course I knew that but at the beginning nothing was loading/opening.. after the main site loaded.. and now it looks like this: https://i.ibb.co/RP1Fg9d/zn.jpg Still not the best because of fewer trackers but at least is working now.
The server is in Germany.
"Good to see someone who not give up and make effort to run ZN.." - Yes, It's been a while I'm here and I really like the idea and the platform and everything and I really don't want this project to die and I wish more ppl to join. Just would be nice if the founder will come back and continue to work on it as he made something amazing I think, not worth to let it die...

Hey guys,
Thanks for all the help. So I didn't knew that I have to install TOR manually :D Sorry, I know is so lame but I'm just learning linux and stuff like that :)
So then I managed to install TOR.. but then it was still not ok something, so some debug error fixing and guide on ZN Docs and I made it work so this is what my console says: https://i.ibb.co/Qv7mJL0/s1.png
But there is an issue, it says I have to upgrade.. but I got much more trackers working (looks the same as on my win) as before and now it shows TOR Connected (250 OK), you can check here: https://i.ibb.co/5Yv9fD0/s2.png
So now I can say I think is working ookaayy.. but :D fuck.. should I upgrade to V3.. Idk again how :D and as I heard just a  few ppl on V3 and no trackers or something like that and they changed back to V2..
